data.title: $BERA is available on Aevo Pre-Launch Market
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: According to official news, Aevo announced the launch of $BERA on its Pre-Launch market.

data.title: Trump's IEEPA tariff order may boost Bitcoin growth
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: US President Trump recently invoked the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) to impose comprehensive tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China, sparking market concerns about the dominance of the US dollar. This move not only affects the global trade pattern, but may also prompt more investors to turn to Bitcoin as a safe haven. James Butterfill, head of research at CoinShares, pointed out that the unconventional use of IEEPA may accelerate global de-dollarization and drive capital flows to decentralized assets such as Bitcoin to hedge against economic instability. Crypto derivatives trader Gordon Grant also believes that the frequent use of IEEPA may weaken the credit of the US dollar and make digital assets such as Bitcoin more attractive. (TheBlock)

data.title: Union Seeks Court Order To Block Data Sharing With Musk's Team
data.description: According to Foresight News, a U.S. union has filed a lawsuit requesting a temporary court order to prevent the U.S. Treasury Department from sharing personal and financial data with Elon Musk's government efficiency team. The lawsuit highlights reports that U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent permitted the DOGE team access to the federal payment system following the resignation of a career official from the Department of Justice. The systems in question reportedly contain confidential information about taxpayers, employees, and companies.

data.title: Plan ₿ Forum Concludes In El Salvador With Unveiling Of Satoshi Nakamoto Statue
data.description: According to Odaily, the Plan ₿ initiative, a collaboration with Tether aimed at promoting the use of Bitcoin and blockchain technology, concluded its event in El Salvador on January 31, 2025. Following the unveiling of the first Satoshi Nakamoto statue in Lugano, Switzerland, the inaugural Plan ₿ Forum in El Salvador also revealed a second statue dedicated to the Bitcoin creator.

data.title: Bitcoin Enters Second Bull Market Phase, Analyst Suggests
data.description: According to Odaily, cryptocurrency analyst PlanB has indicated that nearly a year after the Bitcoin halving event, the S2F model shows a transition from a red dot to an orange one, eventually turning yellow. This shift signifies the market's entry into the second phase of a bull market, characterized by a significant surge driven by fear of missing out (FOMO).

data.title: About 1.729 million $UNI were transferred from Binance to Galaxy Digital’s marked address
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: On-chain data shows that approximately 1,729,686.46 $UNI were transferred from Binance to the Galaxy Digital OTC mark address, worth approximately US$16,103,380.94. The relevant wallet currently holds approximately 7.1 million $UNI, worth approximately US$66.5 million.

data.title: Bitcoin(BTC) Drops Below 98,000 USDT with a 1.84% Decrease in 24 Hours
data.description: On Feb 05, 2025, 15:05 PM(UTC). According to Binance Market Data, Bitcoin has dropped below 98,000 USDT and is now trading at 97,908.140625 USDT, with a narrowed 1.84% decrease in 24 hours.

data.title: Tether unveils second Satoshi statue at Plan ₿ forum in El Salvador
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to official news, Plan ₿ is an initiative established in cooperation with Tether to promote the use of Bitcoin and blockchain technology. The initiative ended in El Salvador from January 30 to 31, 2025. Following the unveiling of the first Satoshi Nakamoto statue in Lugano, Switzerland, the first Plan ₿ forum held in El Salvador also unveiled the second Satoshi Nakamoto statue.

data.title: 1,239,940,928,235 SHIBs transferred out from Kraken, worth over $20 million
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily reported that according to Whale Alert monitoring, 1,239,940,928,235 SHIBs were transferred out from Kraken, worth US$20,136,020.

data.title: 1,155,431 #TRUMP transferred out of Kraken, worth over $23 million
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to Whale Alert monitoring, 1,155,431 #TRUMP were transferred out of the cryptocurrency exchange Kraken, worth US$23,166,972.
